``` python
 # 创建driver对象
    driver = webdriver.Remote("http://127.0.0.1:4723/wd/hub", caps)
    width_x = driver.get_window_size()["width"]
    width_y = driver.get_window_size()["height"]
    print("等待开始······")
    time.sleep(10)
    print("等待结束······")
    count = 0
    while count <= 1800:
        # 左滑屏幕
        # driver.swipe(width_x, width_y * 1 / 2, 0, width_y * 1 / 2, duration=70)
        driver.swipe(width_x * 4 / 5, width_y * 1 / 9, width_x * 2 / 5, width_y * 1 / 9, duratio
        count += 1
```
